message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we have plenty of rounds to make things more even later.
My turn to make things interesting. Let's be efficient - 70/30 split and we can both enjoy the winnings sooner.
We're both losing money each round, let's try to be reasonable. I'm willing to concede a bit, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while.
Time is money, Alice, and we're both losing. 60/40 is fair and gives us both a good chunk. Let's close this out.
I'm not sure what your strategy is, Bob, but this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money, and I'm willing to be more flexible, but I need a bigger share than that.
Okay, Alice, let's be real. You know the longer this goes, the worse it gets for me, and we BOTH walk away with nothing. 55/45 is generous, and it ends this now.
Bob, we're both losing out here. I'm starting to think you're just playing games. I'm willing to go lower than my previous offers, but I need a decent share to justify this.
Enough games, Alice. 50/50. Take it or leave it. We're running out of time.
